short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Autocomplete text using OpenAI Completions API

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web copilot is a powerful Chrome extension that enhances your typing experience with the help of OpenAI's GPT-3.5-turbo or GPT-4. It provides real-time autocomplete suggestions as you type, helping you write faster, more accurately, and more efficiently.

Features:

Auto-complete suggestions: Get context-aware autocomplete suggestions for text inputs, textareas, and content editable elements while typing, saving you time and effort.

Smart context analysis: The extension intelligently extracts the context from your text, providing more relevant and accurate suggestions based on the conversation or content.

Customizable settings: Adjust the number of tokens, context characters, and other settings to fine-tune the suggestions according to your needs.

Works across various websites: Whether you're composing a tweet, writing an email, or engaging in an online chat, the extension works seamlessly across multiple websites and platforms.

Easy to use: Activate the suggestions with a simple keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+Space) and navigate through them with the arrow keys.

Secure and private: Your text data is sent securely to OpenAI's API and not stored or shared.

Upgrade your typing experience with AI-Assisted Text Completion and leverage the power of AI to communicate more effectively and efficiently.
